unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Jolt in Mumbai!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a Jolt in Mumbai!**

unnormalised: Mumbai folks, ditch those range anxieties! EV charging infrastructure is finally getting a serious boost, thanks to a new initiative spearheaded by IIT Bombay alumni. Remember that scene in "Don" where Vijay needs a quick getaway? Well, imagine if he had an EV, he'd need a charge point!
normalised: Mumbai folks, ditch those range anxieties! Electric Vehicle charging infrastructure is finally getting a serious boost, thanks to a new initiative spearheaded by Indian Institute of Technology Bombay alumni. Remember that scene in "Don" where Vijay needs a quick getaway? Well, imagine if he had an Electric Vehicle, he'd need a charge point!

unnormalised: The project aims to install fast chargers every 5 km across the city and surrounding areas like Navi Mumbai and Thane within the next 12 months. Charging costs are expected to be around Rs. 15 per unit.
normalised: The project aims to install fast chargers every five kilometer across the city and surrounding areas like Navi Mumbai and Thane within the next twelve months. Charging costs are expected to be around rupee fifteen per unit.

unnormalised: Early reports show a pilot project near Bandra-Kurla Complex has been a hit, with waiting times currently minimal.
normalised: Early reports show a pilot project near Bandra-Kurla Complex has been a hit, with waiting times currently minimal.

unnormalised: "We want to make EV ownership a no-brainer," said Rohan Sharma, the project lead. "No more struggling to find a plug point like searching for a rickshaw in the rain!"
normalised: "We want to make Electric Vehicle ownership a no-brainer," said Rohan Sharma, the project lead. "No more struggling to find a plug point like searching for a rickshaw in the rain!"

unnormalised: The project hopes to attract more private investment and expand to other major cities, like Delhi and Bangalore, soon. So, get ready to cruise in your EV, knowing a charge is just around the corner! No more "Bijlee" (electricity) woes!
normalised: The project hopes to attract more private investment and expand to other major cities, like Delhi and Bangalore, soon. So, get ready to cruise in your Electric Vehicle, knowing a charge is just around the corner! No more "Bijlee" (electricity) woes!
